title: Dose anyone else think Caitlyn needs a reword desperately
body: been playing caitlyn recently and it seems to me that she is really bad compared to other adc's, like give me some reasons why you would play her over a different champ

replies.body:

you're probably new to adc?

>some reasons why you would play her over a different champ

-one of the easiest adc

-strong early, can be used to punish stuff like {{champion:67}}
oh whats this. to all those nae-sayers that said Caitlin was fine, looks like i was right and riot agreed
She is the easiest champion to pick up for learning the role adc, point and click ult, safe farm and harass, good poke with q, and a trap that snares and does DoT. Umm yea shes shit.

her range advantage is nullified against any champ with a gap closer, and her gap closer seems to be on a much longer cd, and her poke, tho long range is easily dodged due to the channel time it requires

Reasons why i would play Caitlyn 
-long range auto attack (Free auto attacks poke on enemies)
-Safe laning phase 
-Ability to zone enemies and deny farm
-Good siege 
-lane bully 
-Have an escape
-Snare on W
-insane range on ult and Q
-E slow good for kiting 
-Headshot (passive) ignores 50% bonus armour
-Headshot helps with last hitting
-Good waveclear with Q
-high AS growth (good compensation to lack of steroid)
-Headshot (another compensation to lack of steroid)
This is all i can think of for now

You can call her Caitlin instead of Caitlyn if she needs to be reworded that badly.

jk, she's actually very good with non-traditional supports. She's definitely longer ranged and safer than Graves or Vayne, so safety supports like Soraka and Janna aren't as useful as aggressive supports like Annie, Leona or Xerath, who turn the lane into either a poke-flash-ignite-fest, engage-and-poke-fest, or poke-and-poke-and-die-fest, respectively.

Her laning phase is the safest in League, she can poke better than anyone else assuming you use her passive correctly, she has an escape + traps, an execute that can work wonders when used during the laning phase. She beats most ADC's early game and midlane, she needs to stay ahead to do well and if the game goes on for to long she falls off.

So she's like every ADC, has pros and cons.
